title: Suggestions for a Multi-Weight/Width Slab Serif?
content:
I’m hoping to find a slab-seriffed face in the same vein as Knockout/Champion (i.e., with a variety of weights and widths and ideally just a bit of vintage character). Anyone know of such a rare creature?

 [‹ Flickr: Type & Lettering from India](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207214650/http:/typophile.com/node/52417 "Go to previous forum topic") [Home bookbinding kits & ideas? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207214650/http:/typophile.com/node/52205 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Spencer Cross

comments.content:
Hi Spencer,

what about these?  
 [Soho](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207214650/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/monotype/soho_pro_virtual/)  
 [Dispatch](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207214650/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/slab/Dispatch)  
 [Giza](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207214650/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Giza/styles)  
 [Prelo Slab](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207214650/http:/www.dstype.com/prelo_slab.html)  
 [Enclave](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207214650/http:/www.terminaldesign.com/fonts/set/?ID=28)  
F
